title: eMail Address Extractor 3.5.9 – Get email addresses from text files
content: eMail Address Extractor allows you to extract valid email addresses from virtually any kind of text file. No configuration required, it just works! Select your output file format, then drop data files onto eMail Address Extractor to quickly produce a list of all valid email addresses with no duplicates. title: ColorWell 7.3.4 – Instant access to the OS X color wheel
content: ColorWell provides instant access to the macOS Color Wheel by configuring hotkeys. Generate unlimited Color Palettes with quick access to all color information, and on the fly code generation for app development. title: Xliff Editor 2.9.8 – Xcode localization made easy
content: Xliff Editor provides the easiest way of editing your XLIFF files. No more messing around with the XML format, or worrying about file corruption. title: WebScraper 4.15.3 – Scan and output website data as CSV or JSON [FIX]
content: WebScraper uses the Integrity v6 engine to quickly scan a website, and can output the data (currently) as CSV or JSON. title: Hides 5.6.1 – Keep a squeaky-clean workspace
content: Hides allows you to effortlessly clear your desktop in one quick keystroke to quickly hide sensitive information. Enable Focus Mode, to focus on the task at hand. What is Focus Mode? title: Invisible 2.5.7 – Easily hide your personal files
content: Invisible is the quickest way to keep personal documents away from unwanted eyes. Drop files onto Invisible to instantly hide them from view, and make them visible again just as easily with the click of a button. title: USBclean 3.6.5 – Keep your thumb drives free from annoying junk files
content: USBclean quickly and easily removes all those pesky junk and ghost files from your external Windows formatted USB drives. .DS_Store, Thumbs.db, .Spotlight, and trashes files take up precious space, and can cause issues on some devices. Remove them all quickly and easily with USBclean. Configure USBclean the way you want! Remove files by dragging your […]
